channel.title: CVE Feed for Gessler GmbH -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Gessler GmbH -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-1039|2024-02-01T21:38:48.454Z -- gessler%20gmbh -- web-master
item.description: Gessler GmbH WEB-MASTER has a restoration account that uses weak hard coded credentials and if exploited could allow an attacker control over the web management of the device.

item.title: CVE-2024-1040|2024-02-01T21:41:08.954Z -- gessler%20gmbh -- web-master
item.description: Gessler GmbH WEB-MASTER user account is stored using a weak hashing algorithm. The attacker can restore the passwords by breaking the hashes stored on the device.
